metadata.name: Suspicious New-PSDrive to Admin Share
metadata.comment: Adversaries may use to interact with a remote network share using Server Message Block (SMB). The adversary may then perform actions as the logged-on user.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('new-psdrive')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('-psprovider ')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('filesystem')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('-root ')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('\\')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('$')))

output.summary: Adversaries may use to interact with a remote network share using Server Message Block (SMB). The adversary may then perform actions as the logged-on user.
